title: Error Document
description: An error document is returned at any point that a synchronous operation fails.

@context.title: The JSON-LD Context for this document

@type.title: JSON-LD identifier for the document type
@type.description: This field is used to define the type of the document, and in this case should be one of the allowed Error Doucment types.  MUST be present.

timestamp.title: When the error occurred. MUST be formatted as UTC big-endian date as per {{ ref('NOTE-datetime') }}.

error.title: A short summary/title for the error

log.title: Some detail as to the error, with any information that might help resolve it.
examples: text log of any debug information for the client
